programme.desc: Fiat 500. A mother and son enlist the help of Moggy to revamp their Fiat 500. The team will need to be creative to find space for electric components in this tiny city car. S1, Ep3

programme.title: Vintage Voltage
programme.desc: Volkswagen Karmann Ghia. The Karmann Ghia looks beautiful, but it never went as fast as it looks. Moggy and his team have been asked to convert it to electric power. S1, Ep1

programme.title: Vintage Voltage

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: And So It Begins. Ant Anstead has 12 weeks until his baby boy is due, and the same amount of time to fulfil a childhood fantasy, to own a 1950s Alfa Romeo 158. S1, Ep1

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: What Lies Beneath. Ant has found a donor 1950s chassis, so his ambitious Alfa 158 build can now begin in earnest. He also digs deep into his inspiration for this project. S1, Ep2

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: Scavengers Delight. Ant visits an Alfa specialist and gets more than he bargained for. Its win-win, but it'll be tricky to fit a Spider's axle, gearbox and engine into his 158. S1, Ep3

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: Across The Pond. Ant is beginning to feel the pressure of his ambitious build. The only place he can get the correct body mould on short notice is more than 5,000 miles away. S1, Ep4

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: The One-Armed Bandit. As the Alfa build nears the halfway point, a torn bicep threatens to derail the project. Ant's wife is surprised to learn that the 158 is a single-seater. S1, Ep5

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: Does My Chassis Look Big In This? Ant's 158 and injured arm are both progressing, but he still needs help. Meanwhile, the body is still in transit and might not fit the chassis. S1, Ep6

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: The Real Deal. Ant hits week seven of his Alfa build and takes the team on a pilgrimage to see an original Alfa 158. He is starstruck and even squeezes into the beauty for a selfie. S1, Ep7

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: O Motor Where Art Thou. Ant's engine for the Alfa 158 is still missing in action and he is losing patience. He's been working early mornings, late nights and weekends. S1, Ep8

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: Rise And Wine. Ant tries to sweet-talk his way into taking the completed Alfa 158 to the US Grand Prix in Austin. But the car isn't done, and the crew must do the heavy lifting. S1, Ep9

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: License To Grille. Ant's ambitious Alfa build is on the home stretch, but his new baby is due any day. And, he gets good news about his plan to unveil the car at the US Grand Prix. S1, Ep10

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic
programme.desc: It's Alive. With the deadline near on his Alfa build, Ant still has to get it running and finalise the design. So, he seeks out legendary designer Chip Foose for advice. S1, Ep11

programme.title: Ant Anstead Master Mechanic

programme.title: Shed And Buried

programme.title: Shed And Buried

programme.title: Combat Dealers

programme.title: Unsolved History: Who Shot RFK?
programme.desc: Who really fired the fatal shot that killed Senator Robert F Kennedy? Was it a lone gunman? We explore the unanswered questions.

programme.title: Unsolved History: The Alamo
programme.desc: History and heroism of Alamo defenders is challenged when the diary of a Mexican officer spurs controversy and outrage regarding Davy Crockett and the Texas revolutionaries.

programme.title: Egypt's New Tomb Revealed
programme.desc: Follow Dr Otto Schaden as he reveals Egypt's greatest find since 1922. A gold coffin is unearthed in the Valley of the Kings, near Tutankhamen's tomb, but will it contain a mummy?

programme.title: Lost City Of The Desert
programme.desc: The ancient city of Petra has baffled experts for decades. Now, new technologies resurrect the city and reveal why this civilization was suddenly abandoned.
